successes.title: OMORI
successes.description: A surreal, exploration, horror RPG. Travel between new (old) worlds and uncover new (old) mysteries with your new (old) friends! â™¥

Pledges.description: Digital download of OMORI'S GAME: the complete game with all it's quests and quirks, playable through the PC (+ Mac if the Stretch Goal is reached)
OMORI Desktop Wallpaper: a 16:9 HD desktop wallpaper illustrated by OMOCAT + All previous tier prizes
Digital download of OMORI'S SOUNDTRACK: a digital download of the original soundtrack made exclusively for this game by SLIME GIRLS and SPACE BOYFRIEND + All previous tier prizes
OMORI PIN SET illustrated by OMOCAT, featuring the artwork from the OMORI trailer. The button pins are 1.5". There are four pins total.  + All previous tier prizes

OMORI'S TSHIRT: A t-shirt with an OMORI design illustrated by OMOCAT. It will be silkscreened on Bella + Canvas 100% cotton t-shirts and available in sizes UNISEX S-3XL. Please make sure to address the size you would like!  + All previous tier prizes

OMORI'S CREWNECK: a crewneck with an OMORI design illustrated by OMOCAT. It will be silkscreened on 50% cotton 50% polyester Gildan crewnecks and available in sizes UNISEX S-3XL. Please make sure to address the size you would like! + All previous tier prizes EXCLUDING OMORI'S TSHIRT

OMORI'S CREWNECK: a crewneck with an OMORI design illustrated by OMOCAT. It will be silkscreened on 50% cotton 50% polyester Gildan crewnecks and available in sizes UNISEX S-3XL. Please make sure to address the size you would like! + All previous tier prizes INCLUDING OMORI'S TSHIRT

OMORI'S SOUNDTRACK *SIGNED* CASSETTE: the entire OMORI soundtrack on casette, signed by SPACE BOYFRIEND and SLIME GIRLS. It will also include extensive notes of the music process. + All previous tier prizes

OMORI'S JUKEBOX Compliation CD: a compilation soundtrack that will appear in the form of a jukebox side-quest in the game. There will be tentatively 12 tracks (+1 hidden) from a diverse group of musicians and bands including Slime Girls, Space Boyfriend, Bo En, Toby Fox, Meishi Smile, Aivi Tran & Surrasshu, Flashygoodness, and Kupek. Includes a guide of where the tracks are in the game. + All previous tier prizes
ONE OMORI *SIGNED* OFFSET POSTER: a 24"x36" poster illustrated by OMOCAT that will be signed by all the members of the OMORI team! + All previous tier prizes
PIXEL COMMISSION by OMOCAT of one character of your choice in the style of the game  + A Handwritten Thank-You Note + All previous tier prizes
A BEHIND-THE-SCENES look at OMORI GAME + Invitation to the OMORI Launch Party and Karaoke Night in L.A. (airfare not included) + All previous tier prizes
